meanings.definition: The act or process of representing something in geometric form.
meanings.sent1: The geometrization of the map helped us understand the area better.
meanings.sent2: She enjoyed the geometrization of shapes in her art class.
meanings.sent3: The geometrization of the cake with frosting made it look like a math problem.
meanings.sent4: His geometrization of the garden transformed it into a work of art.
meanings.sent5: The geometrization of the building's layout made it easier to navigate.

meanings.definition: The act of applying geometric principles to a problem or situation.
meanings.sent1: The geometrization of the puzzle helped him solve it faster.
meanings.sent2: She used geometrization to figure out the best way to arrange the furniture.
meanings.sent3: The geometrization of the traffic flow made the intersection less chaotic.
meanings.sent4: His geometrization of the budget allocation simplified the process.
meanings.sent5: The geometrization of the maze made it easier to find the way out.
